introduction.title: Quick Introduction
introduction.first_paragraph: I'am excited to invite you to participate in my master's thesis research. Your insights are incredibly valuable and will help shape the future of
introduction.thesis: AI understanding of customers in marketing.
introduction.second_paragraph: In just 2 minutes, you'll have the opportunity to share your thoughts and experiences through a brief questionnaire. Your responses will be kept strictly confidential and used solely for academic purposes.

demographics.age: On what age range are you?
demographics.country: On which country do you live?
demographics.hobbies: Select at least 1 hobby you enjoy, or something you are interested in

get_started.title: Getting Started
get_started.first_paragraph: In this section, you'll see a series of Instagram ads. Your task is simple: decide whether each ad is generated by AI or a real ad created and posted by a company.
get_started.second_paragraph: Keep in mind that all brand names have been removed from the ads, and the format has been standardized.

questionnaire.title: Questionnaire
questionnaire.first_paragraph: Now, I'll ask you a few questions about your experience with the ads you just saw.
questionnaire.second_paragraph: Please answer honestly and to the best of your ability.

questions.question1: How clear is the message of this ad to you?
questions.question2: How credible and trustworthy does this ad appear to you?
questions.question3: How visually appealing is this ad?
questions.question4: Did you find the ad relevant to your interests, lifestyle, or needs?
questions.question5: How well did the ad capture your attention?
questions.question6: How well do you think the ad matched your interests and preferences?
questions.question7: Would you consider interacting (e.g., click, purchase) with the ad you saw?
questions.question8: Compared to other ads you have seen, how does this one rank in terms of personal relevance?
questions.question9: How would you rate the overall quality of the ad?
questions.question10: What specific element of the ad influenced your decision to interact or not interact with it? (optional)
questions.question11: Did this ad evoke any emotional responses from you? (e.g., happiness, excitement, trust)? (optional)
questions.question12: Do you think it was an AI-generated ad?

thanks.title: Thank you!
thanks.first_paragraph: I appreciate your time and insights. Thank you for participating in my research.
thanks.second_paragraph: Here is a cat for you üê±
